title: Objectives of biosecurity program
context: [ยง150A-52] Objectives of biosecurity program. The objectives of the biosecurity program shall be to: (1) Establish a multi-dimensional system to prevent the entry into the State and interisland movement of pests and prohibited or restricted organisms without a permit; and (2) Respond effectively to eradicate, control, reduce, and suppress incipient pest populations and established pests and seize and dispose of prohibited or restricted organisms without a permit. [L 2008, c 236, pt of ยง2]
